short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Developer toolkit for JSON, Base64, JWT, and URL encoding/decoding

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Dev Toolkit - JSON, Base64, JWT & URL Tools

Description:
A powerful developer toolkit that helps you format JSON, encode/decode Base64, decode JWT tokens, and handle URL encoding - all in one place!

Key Features:
• JSON Formatter & Validator
  - Format and validate JSON with proper indentation
  - Support for nested objects and arrays
  - Syntax error detection

• Base64 Encoder/Decoder
  - Convert text to Base64 and back
  - Quick encoding and decoding
  - Format validation

• JWT Token Tools
  - Decode JWT tokens instantly
  - View header, payload, and signature
  - Encode JSON to JWT format
  - JWT structure validation

• URL Encoder/Decoder
  - Handle special characters in URLs
  - Encode/decode query parameters
  - Support for complex URLs

Additional Features:
• Dark Mode Support
• Copy to Clipboard
• Clear Function
• Simple and Clean Interface
• Instant Results
• No External API Calls - Works Offline

Perfect for:
- Web Developers
- API Testers
- Security Engineers
- DevOps Teams
- Anyone working with JSON, Base64, JWT, or URLs

Privacy & Security:
- No data collection
- All processing happens locally
- No external server communication
- Your data stays in your browser

Open source and free to use!
